summary: This document is an internal email forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a voice message about potential Epstein properties in New Mexico. The sender is on vacation and is passing the inquiry to colleagues for follow-up the following week.

persons.name: M, (USANYS) 3
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the forwarded email, indicating they are on vacation and punting the inquiry about Epstein properties in New Mexico to colleagues.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein Properties in New Mexico
events.description: A voice message is received inquiring if the U.S. Attorney's Office is investigating Epstein properties in New Mexico.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York received an inquiry about investigating Jeffrey Epstein's properties in New Mexico in August 2019.
The inquiry was received via a voice message, which was attached to an email forwarded internally.
The email indicates the matter was being deferred for handling the following week as the initial recipient was going on vacation.
